name: Jumpluff
flavorText:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

previous.name: Skiploom
previous.flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

next.name: Aipom
next.flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

pokemon.name: Hoppip
pokemon.flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

pokemon.name: Skiploom
pokemon.flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.
